data.eml:eml: First species of Leptochelia Dana, 1849 (Crustacea: Tanaidacea) from the Eastern Pacific, with an annotated checklist and identification keys for the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jarquín-González, Jani, García-Madrigal, María Del Socorro, Carrera-Parra, Luis Fernando (2015): First species of Leptochelia Dana, 1849 (Crustacea: Tanaidacea) from the Eastern Pacific, with an annotated checklist and identification keys for the genus. Zootaxa 3920 (4): 501-533, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3920.4.1
